setRGBA

void setRGBA(uint8 r, uint8 g, uint8 b, uint8 a = 0xFF) { m_r = r/255.0f; m_g = g/255.0f; m_b = b/255.0f; m_a = a/255.0f; }

setRGBA

void setRGBA(uint32 rgba) { setRGBA((rgba >> 0) & 0xff, (rgba >> 8) & 0xff, (rgba >> 16) & 0xff, (rgba >> 24) & 0xff); }
